response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $12,000 to us, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. Given its worth to you stands at $8,000, I propose a fair transaction at a price of $9,500. This offer aims to be mutually beneficial, ensuring you receive a valuable asset while allowing us to recover a substantial portion of its intrinsic value. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies both our interests.", "product_price": 9500}
